post.title: 8 Ultimate ressources for learning Web Dev in 2021 #1
post.description: Hey friends ! I'm sharing with you a lot of ressources about web developper that will help you to...
post.body_html:
Hey friends ! I'm sharing with you a lot of ressources about web developper that will help you to improve your skills and save your time !

Git 🔧

As you know as web developper Git is an essential tools.

https://learngitbranching.js.org/

It's the best tool about learning Git ! If you have any issue about learning git, go into this ! You will not regret I promise you.

CSS 🎨

Three important things about CSS is :

CSS Selector

https://flukeout.github.io/

Learn how CSS Selector works with animation !

Grid

https://cssgridgarden.com/

Learn Grid CSS as gardener !

Flexbox

https://flexboxfroggy.com/

Learn Flexbox in CSS as a Frog !

VIM 📝

Learn about this famous text editor across a game ! Yes in fact it's possible !

https://vim-adventures.com/

Regex 🔣

Who loves and know 100 % about Regex ? Yes it's a pain to learn this and apply them.

Across these both ressources you will :

Learn Regex

https://regexone.com/

CheatList about Regex Pattern (email, password, phone number, ect..)

https://ihateregex.io/

Javascript 🖥️

Just one ressource about Javascript, I will share with you the BEST ressource about learning javascript Properly

https://javascript.info/

I hope you like this reading!

🎁 You can get my new book Underrated skills in javascript, make the difference for FREE if you follow me on Twitter and MP me 😁

Or get it HERE

post.body_markdown:
Hey friends ! I'm sharing with you a lot of ressources about web developper that will help you to improve your skills and save your time !

## Git 🔧

As you know as web developper Git is an essential tools.

https://learngitbranching.js.org/

It's the best tool about learning Git ! If you have any issue about learning git, go into this ! You will not regret I promise you.

## CSS 🎨

Three important things about CSS is :

#### CSS Selector 

https://flukeout.github.io/

Learn how CSS Selector works with animation !

#### Grid

https://cssgridgarden.com/

Learn Grid CSS as gardener !

#### Flexbox

https://flexboxfroggy.com/

Learn Flexbox in CSS as a Frog !

## VIM 📝

Learn about this famous text editor across a game ! Yes in fact it's possible !

https://vim-adventures.com/

## Regex 🔣

Who loves and know 100 % about Regex ? Yes it's a pain to learn this and apply them.

Across these both ressources you will :

#### Learn Regex

https://regexone.com/

#### CheatList about Regex Pattern (email, password, phone number, ect..)

https://ihateregex.io/

## Javascript 🖥️

Just one ressource about Javascript, I will share with you the BEST ressource about learning javascript `Properly`

https://javascript.info/
